page_title: Master of Supply Chain and Logistics Management - Plan MC198OX
text: Course Title | Credit Points | Course Code | Campus Supply Chain Principles | 12 | OMGT1021 | City Campus Business Analytics | 12 | ISYS3374 | City Campus Supply Chain Modelling & Design | 12 | OMGT2087 | City Campus Business Project Management | 12 | BUSM4610 | City Campus Strategic Operations and Supply Chain Management | 12 | OMGT2191 | City Campus Distribution and Freight Logistics | 12 | OMGT1012 | City Campus International Logistics | 12 | OMGT2088 | City Campus Supply Chain Sustainability | 12 | OMGT2190 | City Campus Business Research Design | 12 | BUSM4448 | City Campus e Business Supply Chains | 12 | OMGT1236 | City Campus Managing Supply Contracts | 12 | BUSM1474 | City Campus Strategic Procurement Management | 12 | OMGT2236 | City Campus Predictive and Prescriptive Analytics in Business | 12 | ISYS3483 | City Campus Visualising and Communicating Insights in Business | 12 | ISYS3438 | City Campus Digital Risk Management and Information Security | 12 | INTE1002 | City Campus Digital Innovation | 12 | INTE1014 | City Campus Leadership and Management | 12 | BUSM1530 | City Campus People and Organisations | 12 | BUSM3249 | City Campus Design Thinking for Business | 12 | BUSM4534 | City Campus To graduate you must complete the following. All courses listed may not be available each semester.
